attributes.action: Serious official investigation into the chemtrails by planes over the uk
attributes.additional_details: A seroius investigation into the growing chemtrails left over uk skies. to investigate why they are being done ant what the chemicals consist of and if this is being done legally. The information to be made public, as it is the public these chemicals are being dropped on.

rejection.details: There is no evidence that 'chemtrails' are anything but a rumour.
